original_text: Judas was ready to help the Jewish leaders to take hold of Jesus. Before this, he had told them, ‘I will kiss one of the men. You must take hold of that man.’
korean_text: 예수를 파는 자가 그들에게 군호를 짜 이르되 내가 입맞추는 자가 그이니 그를 잡으라 한지라

sentences.original_text: Judas was ready to help the Jewish leaders
sentences.korean_translation: 유다는 유대 지도자들을 돕을 준비가 되어 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: 'I will kiss one of the men'
sentences.korean_translation: '나는 그 사람들 중 한 사람에게 입을 맞출 것입니다'

sentences.original_text: 'You must take hold of that man'
